pages.title: Stone Beaver
pages.text: Abominal creation of the PurgenMan. Crawls in the deepest caverns of the world and chomps the shiny ores. Absolutely dumb and chaotical creature. Can be incited to bite any creature by using a Beaver Staff. Shift-LMB(hit) an entity to set target to it. Then RMB to incite Stone Beavers to attack this entity.
